name: Bright & Airy Minimalist: The Ultimate Food Photography Prompt Collection
summary: This premium collection features 90 meticulously crafted AI prompts designed to produce high-end, "High-Key" food photography. This pack focuses exclusively on luminosity, freshness, and modern simplicity. Each prompt is engineered to capture the essence of a bright studio or a sun-drenched bistro, emphasizing the natural colors and textures of the ingredients through a clean, uncluttered lens.
